thumb.title: 歴史秘話 10歳の少年のために両親は必死に祈った 本成院（福禄寿）
thumb.description: 本成院（福禄寿）東京都大田区池上1-35-3 鬼子母神堂 東京都大田区池上１丁目３３−３出典 A RURAL STREET IN OLD JAPAN -- Happy Family on the Roadside https://flic.kr/p/4S2KCp THE DOCTOR MAKES A HOUSE CALL in OLD JAPAN https://flic.kr/p/5kwKCg No. 63 Explaining of Buddhism.Syracuse University https://onlinecollections.syr.edu/objects/38329/no-63-explaining-of-buddhism FSA A1999.35 240 [Ogawa's parents].Smithsonian Institution https://sova.si.edu/record/fsa.a1999.35/ref346?f=online_media_type%3AImages&s=1140&n=12&t=D&q=japan&i=1150 FSA A1999.35 191 Buddhist priests.Smithsonian Institution https://sova.si.edu/record/fsa.a1999.35/ref267?f=online_media_type%3AImages&s=1272&n=12&t=D&q=japan&i=1283 Schoolboy in Uniform.Smithsonian Institution https://sova.si.edu/record/naa.photolot.97/ref7221?f=online_media_type%3AImages&s=1908&n=12&t=D&q=japan&i=1916 BGM All_the_Love byのるナレーションは音読さん
